info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 4:30AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Bitterly Cold Conditions Through 9 AM This Morning... Bitterly cold temperatures will continue through mid morning, with early morning temperatures between 5 and 20 degrees below zero across the Lake George Saratoga region, the Mohawk Valley, Capital Region, eastern Catskills, Berkshires and southern Vermont. Although winds will be light to calm, the cold conditions could result in frostbite to exposed skin and/or hypothermia if precautions are not taken. Running or even a brisk walk in these conditions could result in frostbite on exposed skin. If necessary to venture outdoors this morning, make sure to wear appropriate clothing, preferably in multiple layers, along with a hat and gloves.
